fields.summary: MR usage counters use the resources requested instead of the resources allocated

Thanks for the patches, [~haibochen].  Looks good in general.  Why the {{TestMRJobs}} changes?

TestUberAM is reusing TestMRJobs. Under uber mode, there is no counter events for JobCounter.SLOTS_MILLIS_MAPS and JobCounter.SLOTS_MILLIS_REDUCES because of the change made in MAPREDUCE-6647.  So the assumption that there is always JobCounter.SLOTS* counter events to verify is no longer valid. Plus, they are deprecated.
